0.ngo_name: LAMDON MODEL SCHOOL PADAM ZANASKAR KARGIL
0.Major_Activities1: This year almost all the teachers arrived from their winter vacation via Chadar trek at the end of February, we have oppened the school on 1st of March, 2018. As the amount of snow fall during the winter was comparatively less then the past many years, all the students could attend their classes from 1st of Marh except LKG and UKG.At the beginning of the session, we were in want of Junior English teacher, History teacher, Physical Education teacher, Bodhi teacher and Buddhist Philosophy teacher

registeration_info.nr_orgName: LAMDON MODEL SCHOOL PADAM ZANASKAR KARGIL

source_info.purpose: Lamdon Model High School Zanaskar has done the expenditure of Rs 72.86 for the staff salary and construction of new building. School gave free education to three hundred twenty five children from remote areas of ladakh region. It also gave sponsorship to poor children.

Lamdon Model High School Zanaskar has done the expenditure of Rs 85.34 for the staff salary and construction of new building. School gave free education to three hundred twenty five children from remote areas of ladakh region. It also gave sponsorship to poor children. During the year construction of hostel building is also done.

Lamdon Model High School Zanaskar has done the expenditure of Rs 129.67 for the staff salary and construction of new building. School gave free education to three hundred twenty five children from remote areas of ladakh region. It also gave sponsorship to poor children. During the year construction of hostel building is also done.
